chapter.title: Deploying and Using &sle; 12-Based &imgsrv; and 64-Bit Client Images
chapter.para: A &sle; 11-based image server can be used to create 32-bit client images. However, to create 64-bit client images required for booting 64-bit Point of Service clients, it is necessary to set up a &sle; 12-based image server on a dedicated machine. The following chapters provide explanation on how to deploy a &sle; 12-based image server as well as create and boot 64-bit client images.
